name: Norman's Demo
description:
Norman's Demo:  Important to know before playing. This is just a demo and it will not show much of the story, however the purpose of it,  it's more or less to feel the mechanic and the experience  of the game. Thank you for downloading the demo of (the Adventures of Norman).

Pledge for our campaign at  indiegogo.com  it will start the first week of September. 

Please,  follow us on Facebook  Norman's  page .

The Game Play:  It's a 2d story side scrolling point and click kind of game: Sci-Fi,
adventure, espionage and mystery.  It's the must.  Norman is a detective.  You're going to help him try to find the clues of the mystery scientist who vanished  in Paris.  Norman will meet with plenty of characters to interact with and make friends too.  Some will get older through time.  You will get a lot of dialogue with humor.   In fact the logic of the game is based on dialogue and interaction with objects to resolve problems.  With Norman you will travel through France, in South and North America, London, Paris and New York City where he lives.  You will feel like you are in the middle of an interactive world where the past and the future will be linked together, with a lot of fun and beautiful scenes hand painted by the artist.  There will be a lot of background sounds, noises and animations, animated objects and characters to enjoy the game play experience.

Would you like more of the story?  go to  indiegogo.com . (We will launch our Campaign in September 03 2018).

Please, any comments  on the DEMO  would be very much appreciated,  thank you.

Important: LINUX and WINDOWS demo hasn't been tested yet. But they will work as it should.
